nodes.text: House Hanarist was a Noble House of Alderaan. Cael was a famous Limmie player in 0 BBY and had a home in Crevasse City and a fiancée of another House. That year, the planet was destroyed by the Galactic Empire. Cael chartered a starship with the last of his family's money to return to the debris site, and then vowed to join the Rebel Alliance.
House Hanarist was mentioned in Cael's Character Folio included with Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game.
